          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Liang Fu付亮
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            Welcome to my personal website!
            I am a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Economics at the University at Albany, SUNY. My main research fields are Monetary Economics and International Economics. My current research focuses on the transition of monetary policy in China.
            I am on the 2021-2022 job market and available for interviews. 
            Curriculum Vitae
            lfu@albany.edu

              I am on the 2021-2022 job market and available for interviews.
